meanings.definition: Having or showing great ambition or desire for success beyond what is normal or expected.
meanings.sent1: She had a superambitious goal to become the best student in her class.
meanings.sent2: The superambitious entrepreneur aimed to build a global empire.
meanings.sent3: His superambitious plan to finish all his homework in one night backfired.
meanings.sent4: The team's superambitious strategy to win the championship involved risky plays.
meanings.sent5: The superambitious project to create a new invention required dedication and hard work.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive ambition or desire for success.
meanings.sent1: The superambitious student wanted to score 100% on every test.
meanings.sent2: Her superambitious nature drove her to take on multiple projects at once.
meanings.sent3: The cat's superambitious attempt to catch the laser pointer light entertained everyone.
meanings.sent4: The tree's superambitious growth reached higher than any other in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The superambitious athlete trained tirelessly to break world records.
